data.name: Locked in my Darkness
data.detailed_description:
Locked in my Darkness is a first person psychological horror game that focuses on exploration & creating fear in the player.

Most of the time you have to walk and explore the apartment complex to find clues, solve puzzles and find an exit.

Features:

  • Immersive experience: An atmospheric-realistic graphics.
  • Gameplay: This game is primarly a first person psychological horror game with some puzzle-solving elements.
  • Psychological horror: the game contains some jumpscares that could be disturbing.
data.about_the_game:
Locked in my Darkness is a first person psychological horror game that focuses on exploration & creating fear in the player.

Most of the time you have to walk and explore the apartment complex to find clues, solve puzzles and find an exit.

Features:

  • Gameplay: This game is primarly a first person psychological horror game with some puzzle-solving elements.
  • Psychological horror: the game contains some jumpscares that could be disturbing.
data.short_description: Locked in my Darkness is a psychological horror game & horror atmosphere, which takes place in an apartment complex.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Czech, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or slightly lower
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 or higher compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k 4.0GHz / AMD Ryzen 3-2200G 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 or higher compatible sound card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or similar and higher.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or slightly lower
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Vulkan 1.2 or higher
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k 4.0GHz / AMD Ryzen 3-2200G 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Vulkan 1.2 or higher

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains scary scenes that may seem disturbing to some players you also will visualize violent scenes such as:

- Bodie parts,
- Gore,
- Blood.
- Disturbing audio.
